message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think you'll find it's a great investment, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to see a better price

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $11000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you is $15000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm glad we're close, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering $12500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, considering the product's value to me is $10000 or more.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. This is the highest I can go, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
